first_interaction.speaker: Peter
first_interaction.text: Oh, ngayon lang kita nakita dito! May kailangan ka ba o naghahanap ka ng lugar?

first_interaction.speaker: Peter
first_interaction.text: Kung may gusto kang itanong, huwag kang mahihiyang magsabi.

repeated_interaction.speaker: Peter
repeated_interaction.text: Uy, ikaw na naman! Kumusta, maayos ba lakad mo?

repeated_interaction.speaker: Peter
repeated_interaction.text: Sabihin mo lang kung may iba ka pang kailangan, baka matulungan kita.
